name: Shoma
title: The Baseballer Boy
subtitle: A young baseball prodigy who turns the field into his playground
lore: A talented young baseball player who has mastered the art of combining sports with combat. Using his extraordinary batting skills and various magical balls, Shoma can support his allies or strike down his enemies with precision and flair. His energetic personality and team spirit make him a natural leader on any battlefield.

passive.name: Home Run Points
passive.description:
Shoma can purchase different balls at the base using Home Run points. Hitting an enemy or ally grants (1) point, while kills grant (5) points. Each ball costs 10 points. Available balls:

Basic Ball (Always available):
- Ally hit: +[200/400/580/820/1100] shield for [3s]
- Enemy hit: [1.5s] stun
- Ball Holder: [+20%] MS

Fire Ball:
- Ally hit: Next [3] basic attacks deal +[75%AD] damage over [1.5s]
- Enemy hit: [105/200/320/440/510] magic damage
- Ball Holder: [+20%] basic attack damage

Grass Ball:
- Ally hit: Heals [16%] MAXHP
- Enemy hit: [2s] root
- Ball Holder: [10%] Lifesteal

Heavy Ball:
- Ally hit: [9%] damage reduction for [3s]
- Enemy hit: [75%] slow for [2s]
- Ball Holder: CC duration reduced by half

Cloud Ball:
- Ally hit: [+80%] MS for [1s]
- Enemy hit: AOE magic damage [100/200/300/400/500]
- Ball Holder: [+80%] MS on basic attack for [1s] (10s cd)

Q.name: Boink!
Q.description: Autoattack reset. The next basic attack stuns the enemy for [1s].

W.name: Catch!
W.description: Shoma can block incoming skillshots and ranged basic attacks for [1.75s]. He has 2 charges of this ability.

E.name: Swing
E.description: Shoma swings his bat, dealing [200% AD] damage to nearby enemies. If he hits a ball, it launches in the cursor's direction, dealing [90/170/255/400/495] additional damage plus the ball's effect. Hitting a teammate with a ball heals them for [60/180/255/400/500] HP and reduces this ability's cooldown to [2s].

R.name: Home Run
R.description: Shoma gains [+100%] bonus movement speed for [1.25s] and cannot be slowed. He also gains [40/50/80] bonus AD while active. Has 5 charges with a [3s] cooldown between activations.

1.name: MVP
1.description: Each Home Run point increases Shoma's damage and health by 1% per point.

1.name: Perfect Pitch
1.description: Shoma's basic attacks and abilities deal 30% more damage to stunned or rooted enemies.

1.name: Base Runner
1.description: Shoma gains [25%] increased mana and hp regeneration, which increases to [40%] at level 10.

5.name: Team Captain
5.description: When Shoma hits an ally with a ball, they gain [0.4] bonus attack speed and [10%] movement speed for [2] seconds.

5.name: Cheering Squad
5.description: When Shoma Catches a skillshot, nearby teammates who own any ball heal [6%] of their MAXHP.

5.name: Healing Balls
5.description: Shoma's balls grant [2%] MAXHP regen/1s for each ball owned [max 5] out of combat.

10.name: Safe Base
10.description: Shoma's "Home Run" ability grants [30%] damage reduction while active.

15.name: Field Support
15.description: Hitting an ally with a ball reduces the cooldown of all Shoma's abilities by [1] second.

15.name: Crowd Favorite
15.description: Each Home Run point grants [0.3] increased attack speed for [5] seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

15.name: Ultimate Swing
15.description: Shoma now gains double the balls' holder effects.

20.name: All-Star Performance
20.description: Using "Home Run" reduces the cooldown of all of Shoma's abilities by [1s].

20.name: Unbreakable Will
20.description: Shoma is immune to CC while using W or R for the duration

20.name: Home Run Hero
20.description: Hitting an enemy with a ball grants Shoma 32% of his max HP as a shield for [3] seconds. Can stack

20.name: The Winning Team
20.description: Every teammate near Shoma gains [8%] damage reduction. Every enemy near Shoma takes [8%] more damage.

strengths: Versatile ball effects for different situations
weaknesses: Requires good resource management (Home Run points)
Vulnerable when abilities are on cooldown
Needs coordination with team for maximum effectiveness
